attributes.action: Free University education for ALL UK Students Stop discrimination
attributes.additional_details:
Students in Scotland do not pay tuition fees.

Students in the rest of the UK are charged fees of up to £9,000 per annum.

Students in the rest of the UK are also charged fees of up to £9,000 per annum by Scottish universities BUT those from other EU member states are not charged fees!

This is blatant discrimination against English, Welsh and Irish students.

The Department for Education should ensure that there is an even playing field for all UK students preferential treatment should NOT be given to one group of people.

To right the wrong that has been and is still being carried out on English, Welsh and Irish Students, before the next general election.
